subject: Re: Book for sale on how to modify the 12-469, why?
author: leongbabe@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1227386594
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

I have Craig Telesha's book on technology used by ghost hunters and  found it 
very informative and easy to understand.  He covers a wide range  of 
traditionally-used equipment, from cameras to EMF readers, and has a section  on newer 
technology which includes the ghost boxes.  He acknowledged Frank  Sumption's 
and other researchers boxes and yes, he also provided diagrams  on hacking.  
I also wish he credited Mike and Sum on their combined efforts  regarding the 
hacking of Radio Shack radios, but ultimately feel that it was not  a 
deliberate oversight on Mr. Telesha's part.
 
Have a great Thanksgiving everyone!  
 
Sharon from SF
 
P Please consider the environment  before printing this e-mail. Thanks!
